revised_title: Observations of Mad Dog Bites and Their Effects on Two Boys
tldr: Dr. Martin Lister documents the case of two boys who were bitten by a mad dog and experienced a series of symptoms, including convulsive fits, fear of water, and barking like a dog. The boys eventually recovered, but relapsed several times before finally becoming well. Various treatments, including antimony and mercurius vitae, were administered during their illness.
